description:
Whether you’re climbing, riding, or trekking by foot, Roark found a need for a durable all around short that can withstand anything we put it up against. The new Long Road features an 18” outseam and is built from a durable T400 polyester blend featuring mechanical stretch.

The oversized back pockets, and front leg cell pocket provide plenty of storage compared to the traditional walk short. You can count on the Long Road as your everyday wearer or partner in crime for any demands your favorite activity throws at you.
name: Roark Long Road Durable Stretch Shorts 18" - Mens
